div.p:
Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xijo die
mensis Junij anno Dominj et cetera lxxvjto quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata et cetera

the samen dai the Aldirman askit at the ballies til assigne him quhare he sal
get payment of xxij merkis quhilkis he has pait and gottin quittancis of / that is tosay
of xiiij merkis acht to the king / four' merkis anent the lard of garntuly and v merkis
of the elect of Catnes pension' maistir Alexander steuart And than the ballies and
in speciale William blindsel assignit to the aldirman Johne Wormot than beand
present for the payment of the said some' of xxij merkis tobe pait be him of the wattir
malis of the Raik / the mydchingil and of the pot / acht to the toun' et cetera

The said dai It was determyt and deliuerit be ane assise / that quhat thing
Johne stevinson wil preve sufficently he has pait til Johne the vaus of
the four' barellis of salmond sen the last compt to rekning betuix thaim in
Johne stevinsonis yard before Thomas fife the yer' that James lesly was
aldirman salbe allowit and strekin of to him And falyeand of his preif tomak
him payment . And thar is assignit this dai xv daies for the production of the
said preif gif merk scot cumis hame than / and gif he bidis langar tobe
continuit to the morn eftir his cuming / And of the bol of salt and tvnne his barel
clamit be John the vaus / the said John' stevinson grantis to mak payment And
anent thre merkis that Johne stevinson clamis Jhon' the vaus ./. the assis' ordanis
gif John' the vaus wil acquite him be his aith of the said iij merkis that he
hecht thaim nocht to John stevynson / he is quite And falyeand tharof it salbe strekin
of / til John' stevinson And Johne the vaus askit tobe avisit quhil the
morn tomak his aith' John' the vaus has declarit be his aith . that he hecht
til Johne stevinson bot j merk of the thre merkis clamit be him

Item the samyn dai the Aldirman ser Johne ruthirfurd of tarlan anent the action
persewit be him againis Johne of culan of his wattir malis producit thir persons
vndirwritin for previs and witnes as at the dai assignit tharto / And than the
ballies gert be callit Johne of culan tocompere and here the prefis sworn and to
schaw the acquittance that he allegit to haf like as he was warnit and comperit nocht
quharfor the said witnes and prefis beand lachfully summond and warnit the
gret aith' sworn and examinit deponit and declarit as eftir folowis / that is
tosay ser Johne streviling chaplan and notar first witnes In presence of ser Da
uid vaus commissar t part sittand in the con sayde and deponit / that the yer' of
god jM iiiijC lxxxiiij / quhen ser Johne ruthirfurd was aldirman of abirdene
my lord marscheal passit til Johne of culanis yet in the gallougate and sperit
for the said Johne / for payment of his wattir mail of demi net of the Raik assig
nit to the said lord procuratour til lord Erskyn eftir the tenor of ane act maid tharuppon
And with the Erle marschel thar was William blindsel and Dauid marr' twa of
the ballies in the tym quhilkis dischargit thaim to the said lord of Johne of culanis
mail . And thareftir the said lord wald haf distressit and poyndit the said Jhonnis
Innys for the samen mail . And than the said Aldirman besocht the lord tosuper
seid apon the poynding / and he suld pay him of the said mail And at the instance
of the aldirman the lord supersedit apon the pvynding and tuke the aldirman dettour' be
his hand for payment of the said mail / and dischargit the ballies and John' of
culan tharof . Dauid marr' second witnes sais as the first witnes in al thing
iijus 4us et vtus testes . Alexander marr' Johne the vaus and philp of Dunbrek concordis in thare deposicion
with the twa first witnes . Attour William blindsel rehersit that the Erle marschel
deponit to him be his aith . that he tuke til ser Johne of ruthirfurd aldirman for the
said Johne for culans wattir malis and dischargit the ballies and him tharof . And that
the ballies dischargit thaim of the said wattir mail to the lord of before . And
that patrik myddilton' declarit be his aith in the said matir as the lord did et cetera

In the balye court haldin the xvij dai of Junij the yer' of lxxxvj Thom gray
Johne of narn John' of lammynton' cristy prat Sande prat alexander fyndlau
androw louson Wil cardno and rob fleschar' ilkane in amerciament be thir awne
grant for breking of the price set be the prisaris apon the flesch' and for sel
ling of flesch' vnprisyt

Sande meirnys and Wil burges baxtaris ar vnlawit for breking
of the paas' of the breid et cetera

vltimo die Junij / Jurati fuerunt ad taxacionem extentus Itineris camerarie
Jacobus lesly Robertus blindsel thomas fife Johannes colison alexander
reid Dauid menyes iunior Dauid mathoson et thomas prat

The xiiij dai of Julij In the court haldin be Thomas of chamer ane of the
ballies / fyndlau fores and Johne fichet schipman war convict be assise
in amerciament be thar awn' grant for the wranguis' withhalding of xx s' v d'
for lyme siluer fra thom of tullo / and tocontent him as law wil

The xvij dai of Julij the yer' forsaid before Thomas of chamer and John'
stevynson twa of the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samyn
Comperit Thom of tulloch induellar' of leith . and has tayn topreve
within xl daies before the ballies of this burgh . that he has content and
pait thom of turyn in leith factour til Androw goldsmyth in that part of
the siluer of twa barrellis of ry meil as the price tharof was derrest
in scotland in the tym eftir the tenour of his obligacion maid to the said androw
tharuppon . And falyeand of his preif as forsaid is tobe condampnit
in the some' tobe pait to the said androw quhare evir he may be apprehen
dit et cetera

Die xxma mensis Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjto Coram Thoma de camera
vno ballivorum de abirdene thomas tulloch constituit Dauid marr' suum procuratorem
ad petendum et nomine suo recipiendum a Johanne fichet x s' ij d' ob' pro parte sua
xx s' et v d' alias optentos super eum et findelaium fores per dictum thomam Nec
non ad prosequendum dictum Johannem pro iiij s' iij d' ob' sibi ut asserit debit' per
eundem penes Arthurum forbes de receptis quieteclamandis Et promisit de rato et cetera

Quo die Willelmus scrymgeour conuictus per assisam amerciatur quia iniuste perturbauit
Johannem sclatar vxorem eiusdem Johannis et domum / et emendabit ad visum proborum
Et ordinavit assisa quod si ammodo dictus Willelmus receptus fuerit in tali perturbio
aduersus quemcumque vicinum huius ville / quod soluet ad fabricam beati niclai xx s'

Eodem die assisa decreuit Thomam tullogh quietum de clameo
Johannis fichet naute penes vnam barellam salis

The xxvj dai of July the aldirman askit payment fra thomas prat
of William garriach yungaris vnlawis as he that becom souerty tharfor / and
tharuppon the said thomas askit laghful dai toget the principale dettour to
free him and referrit him to the ordinance of the consale / the quhilk consel
that mycht be gottyn present for the tym ordanit to distres the said thomas to
the avail of the said vnlawis eftir the ald statutis tobe modifijt be the
consale of the toune and tolat his distres toborgh gif it war askit
quhil this dai xv dais ./ To the quhilk dai the said thomas has bo
rowit his distres the quhilk he layd doune in the name
the said vnlawis , And the aldirman in cais' he be nocht present that dai has
constitute Robert blindsel his deput and procuratour toask recovir and re
save . fra the said thomas the some' of the said vnlawis in his name

Die xxvija Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvj presentibus domino Johanne ruthirfurd preposito
Roberto blindsel Jacobo lesly Johanne de culan alexandro reid Johanne de
Knollis Johanne colison Dauid menyes iuniore Thoma prat Willelmo blindsel
vno balliuorum thoma de marr' gilberto vaus Johanne menyes andrea culan
iuniore alexandro angusson

Molendinum superius et molendinum Inferius assedantur Dauid menyes seniori
suis coadiutoribus et assignatis ad terminum septem annorum a festo pentecostes
proximo futuro quolibet anno pro viginti libris Et sustentabunt omnia necessa
ria dictorum molendinorum et eadem sufficienter reparabunt per dictum tempus

Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per Willelmum blindsel vnum ballivorum eiusdem
xxixno die Julij anno predicto

The quhilk dai the said balye tuke ane Inquisicion' of thir persons that
is tosay . James lesly Johne colison Dauid menyes yungar thomas
prat Johne menyes androw culan eldar Johne more Johne of lammyn
ton' Dauid galichtlie Johne the vaus and patrik reid burgez of
abirdene . gif James clerk and Isabel Kynninmond his spous' sistir
to Androw Kynninmond war laghful procuratouris to the said androw Kynnin
mond . tobe entirit and kend to al landis croftis and possessionis pertening to
the said androw as air' to vmquhile Johne of Kynninmond his fadir
and todispone tharuppon . The quhilkis persons fand and saide that the
said James clerk and Isabel his spous' war lachful procuratouris
and factouris to the said Androw Kynninmond as forsaid is eftir the fourme
of his lettres maid to thaim tharuppon

Die tercia Augusti anno quo supra dominus Johannes de camera capellanus
perpetuus altaris Sancti Jacobi infra ecclesiam beati nicholai de Abirdene
cituati cum consensu et assensu honorabilis viri Johannis turnius de
foverin veri patronj eiusdem obligauit se et suos successores capellanos
dicti altaris ad celebrandum imperpetuum vnam missam semel in ebdomita pro
animabus prouidi viri Johannis steuart burgensis de abirdene et Agnetis
turyng sponse sue defuncte / pro libera donacione et exhibicione vnius
vestimenti rubie serice le vellous' cum li orphorus desuper auro et
ymaginibus context' per prefatum Johannem stewart altari antedicto In cuius
rei testimonium dictus dominus Johannes de camera et Johannes turing patronus ante
dictus in signum sui consensu et assensus Sigillum commune dicti burgi de abirdene
a consulibus et communitate eiusdem cuidam scripto inde confirmando cum instancia apponj
procurarunt in pretorio dicti burgi / Testibus Willelmo blindsel vno balliuorum
Roberto blindsel thoma fife Johanne colison' thoma prat / lyndesay
herraldo burgensibus de abirdene et domino Johanne striueling notario publico cum multis aliis
Insuper si contingat dictum dominum Johannem de camera aut successores suos ca
pellanos perpetuos prefati altaris deficere in celibracione dicte misse qua
libet ebdomita ad dictum altare ut premittutur / obligat se pro tempore suo et
successores suos predictos / Ad soluendum vnum grossum anglicarum . predicto Jo
hannj stewart heredibus suis aut assignatis qualibet ebdomita tociens
quociens sic deficerit / ad distribuendum pro celibracione missarum ut predicitur omissarum

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos in pretorio de abirdene vijo die Augusti
anno et cetera lxxxvj /

Johannes Westland vocatus ad sectam Willelmi blindsel
pro j bonet veli et j cellat / non comparuit

The aldirman ballies counsale and communite of abirdene has gevin and grantit til
Johne of culane in contentacion of his fee the tyme that he was Abbot
of boneacord . al the profite and avail that he may get of ony twa suffi
cent men quhilkis likis him erast to present tobe resavit in the fraternite of
burgessis and gild of the said burgh' / becaus' he had acquittance of Wil
liam blindsel ane of the ballies for the tyme of the some' of ten merkis
for his said fee the quhilk some' was optenit apon the said John' of
culan be the said aldirman / And thai sal resaue the said twa persons
to the samen fraternite and fred' of the said burgh' quhen and quhat tym
conuenient it beis likand to the said John' or his factouris et cetera

The xiiij dai of August the yer' of god et cetera lxxxvj . In the tolbuthe of the
burgh of Abirdene in presence of a honorabil knycht ser William Knollis commandour
of torpichin Johne ramsay Alexander peyrpoint inglisman William cvmyn of
Inuerellochy masar' and diuers' vthiris than beand with the ballies and consale /. The
cowparis of the said burgh . that is tosay Alexander cowpar Wil coupar Duncan cowpar
Wil beldy coupar and patrik coupar chargit be the great aith' sworne saide and
declarit that the barellis that thai had maid now for salmond pakking ar
of the samen band and mesure that thai war of ./ thir iij iiij and v yeris bigain / and
vnmynnist or maid les . And the cowparis ar sworn newlingis tokeip
the samen mesur' and band in tym cuming vnchangit and vnmenyst in defraude
or scaith of ony man

the v dai of Septembre yer' forsaid Thomas fife Johne of culan David
symson thomas prat David menyes eldar androw branche androw murra eldar robert
prat and androw Wenton war chosin and sworn lynaris to decide and knaw apon
the rycht and merchis of the landis of Johne the vaus' and Androw goldsmythis in
the greyn Quhilkis has fundin and deliuerit that the gavil betuix the
landis of Johne the vaus and Androw goldsmyth is propir toserve thaim bath
at al eisment . And anent the hede dike of the yard It salbe castin
downe / & biggit as it is merkit fra the ald grvnd stane to the cunye
of the said Androwis hous'
Curia tenta per balliuos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xixno die Septembris

quo die Andreas lowson inueniet Johannem menyeis plegium legalem pro eo
de indempnitate Johannis lammynton' Et idem Johannes dedit andream lammynton'
plegium legalem pro eo quod dictus andreas erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die Andreas lowson et alexander prat conuicti per assisam amerciantur pro
iniusta perturbacione andree lammynton' et Willelmi cardno / et emenda
re tenentur eisdem ad visum proborum virorum

Iidem andreas lammynton' et Willelmus cardno amerciantur quia iniuste perturbarunt
Andream lowson et alexandrum prat / et emendabunt ut supra

prepositus et consules ordinarunt quod quilibet predictores perturbancium dabit in
pro cera emenda ad lumen Sancti sanguinis Et quod de cetero abunt ami
ciciam et pacem adinuicem sub pena xl s' de parte offendente ad fa
bricam beati nicholai et cetera

The xxvij dai of Septembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxxvj In the tol
buthe of Abirdene before the Aldirman and Wilyeam blindsel ane of
the ballies in Jugement Robert ewynson grantit him dettour' til quhilum
Adam andirson of four' barrellis of tar tilhaf bene deliuerit til
him frely and now til Wilyeam portar' spous' til Agnes the
spous' and executrice of vmquhile the said adam

the samyn dai It was decretit and ordanit be the court that Thomas
of marr' sal entir Wilyeam richartson this dai xl daies in the tol
buthe of this burgh' to the officeris of the samen to the challance of Ro
bert ewynson in sic like fourme as he borowit him fra Williame
blindsel ane of the ballies in the tyme / And falyeand of his entra
as said is / that the said thomas of marr' sal answer' to the said
Robert anent the freing of him of the four' barrellis of tar acht
til vmquhile adam andirson as law wil et cetera

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the last
dai of Septembre yer' forsaid . Alexander scrogis grantit him tobe awand
til Alexander reid ane barel of salmond / quhilk the ballies chargit
him topay within lach'ful tyme

The aldirman and consale has grantit til Androw branche for the clething
of a flemyn outred be him at the ordinance of thaim that he salhaf
in contentacion tharfor / quhat habil person' that he likis erast tocheis'
and present tobe resavit burges and brudir of the gild of this burgh'

The secund dai of october' the yer' aboue writin . the Aldirman and hail consale
ordanit Johne of culan todeliuer his wattir mail of demj net of the Raik
of the termes of martymes and Witsunday last bypast / til Wilyeam
blindsel ane of the ballies the quhilk mail extendant to the sowme
of sex pundis ten s' and v d' the said Johne of culan has deliuerit in thare
presence til the said balye in novmerit money And is quiteclamit tharof
be the said balye in the townis name for evyr

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per Thomam de
fife Alexandrum de camera filium Thomam prat et Andream culan seniorem
balliuos eiusdem nouiter electos secundo die mensis octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjto
Quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata burgenses extra manentes absentes
et amerciamenti patent Infra videlicet Willelmus richartson andreas mvrison Wil
lelmus de carnequhin Johannes fochil Dauid rury alexander scot Duncanus de
cardny Alexander scherar' alexander Watson Willelmus andirson in carnefochil Thomas strath
Alexander clerk Willelmus gray Johannes portar in bothelny alexander sanchar iunior thomas
moir' Johannes morison in Dunbanan

Eodem die Alexander meignes electus fuit ad officium prepositure et ad deser
uiendum fideliter in dicto officio Juramentum prestitit corporale

Philippus de Dunbrek alexander chamer moricius besat et Duncanus stralogh'
electi fuerunt eadem die in seriendos

Johannes de culan Johannes colison Dauid menyes iunior et Johannes Wormot
constituti sunt electi et Jurati depositarij bonorum communium pro anno futuro

the aldirman ballies and consale that now ar' has consentit to the obseruing and
keping of the gravnt maid to Johne of culan of before of twa burges
eftir the tenour of the act / and lettre maid to him tharuppon

the samyn dai comperit before the aldirman ballies and consale in Jugement
Wilyeam andirson eldar in presence of Rothissay herrald til our soueran lord
and sayd that ane callit William andirson was gevin in our Souerain lordis
lettrez to the said herrald to summond' and charge to warde / And askit
certane witnes tobe callit and sworn todeclare quhethir he was summond
be our Souerane lordis lettres of before or nocht anent that matir The
quhilkis witnes that is tosay Wilyeam blindsel ane of the ballies of
abirdene for the tym Philp of Dunbrek alexander chamer morice besat and
Duncan stralogh' seriendis the gret aith' sworn and chargit has opinly
declarit that the said William andirson eldar was nocht summond of before
be our soueran lordis lettres nodir personaly nor at his habitacion

Robert blindsel Dauid menyes yungar Johne colison alexander reed and John
Wormot ar chosin be the consale and sworn tobe and
ruthirfurdis compt of his office of aldirmanschip of this last yere

Eodem die dominus matheus nicolson capellanus ac procurator altaris beati petri apostolorum
principis cituati in ecclesia beati nicholai de abirdene accedens ad barram
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu viginti solidorum eidem
altari et capellano eiusdem annuatim debit' de quadam terra in vico furcarum Jacente
ex parte orientali eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Walteri pyot ex australi
parte et terram quondam Thome crovdan ex parte boriali Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia
coram ballivis pro primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne de tulibo thoma
chepman burgensibus et Duncano stralogh' seriendo

div.head: Consilium CommunieCommune
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchile
Jacobus leslie
Robertus blindsell
Dauid menyeis Junior
Johannes Knollis
Johannes Colisone
Johannes Cullan
Alexander rede
Andreas murray senior
Johannes Wormot
Walterus auchnewe
Alexander mar
Dauid simsone
Robertus prat
Thomas chamer
Dauid matheson
Johannes glenmaluyn
Willelmus malison
Ranaldus tailyour'
Richardus hile
Andreas Wentone
Symon gardin
Dauid prat
Alexander gray
Johannes grige
Willelmus futhes

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per Andream culan vnum balliuorum
eiusdem ixo de octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxxvj /

quo die andreas goldsmyth et Jo
hannes vaus conuicti per assisam amerciantur pro perturbio adinuicem in verbo

Margreta sponsa dicti Andree goldsmyth in amerciamento quia iniusta perturbavit Johannem
vaus verbo et facto - Idem Johannes amerciatur pro perturbio ipsius margrete verbotenus
Iniungitur dictis partibus per assisam de cetero obseruare amiciciam et concordiam sub pena
iiijor librarum cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis de parte frangen' pacem leuand'

The xvj dai of october the yer' of god et cetera forsaid / Wilyeam Kympty
constabil of Abirdene eftir that the proclamacione of the fayr' of the said
burgh was maid Comperit in the tolbuthe before the ballies and thare
constitute and ordanit Alexander chamer theson Androw culan eldar twa of the
ballies and Thomas chamer his deputis coniunctlie and seueraly to keip the
said fayr as efferis in his absence to the Ische of the samen Attour
the Constabil has constitute alexander chamer in the schipraw his officer'
and constabil seriend for the said fair' and forthir indurand his wil The quhilk
officer' is sworn tomak leil and trew ministracion in the said offis

Burgenses et fratres gilde burgi de Abirdene facti tempore Pre
positure Alexandri menyes anno Domini mo CCCCmo octuagesimo sexto

Nobilis dominus Alexander gordoune magister de Huntly cum consensu prepositi
communis consilij et fratrum gilde Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde / et prestitit fidelitatis Juramentum

Thomas lowson Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ob fauorem
dicti magistri Huntlie et quia disponsauit filiam burgensis prestito solito Juramento

Willelmus de Camera filius alexandri de camera de murchile scriba communis dicti burgi
recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento racione paternitatis

Dauid Ogiluy de tolmade recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
pro suis consiliis auxiliis et gratitudinibus et eidem burgo factis Impensis
et Impendendis prestito solito Jurament sed dispensat' secum fuit de
Scott lott waik and warde nisi personalem residen' infra burgum fecerit

fforsicht Dauisone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione et
Jure paternitatis prestito solito Juramento et dedit quinque s' in alba bursa

Willelmus gareache Junior filius Jacobi gareache recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento per composicionem Johannis Culan apud act' sibi
prius concess'

v Andreas Watsone filius thome Watsone recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde racione paternitatis prestito Juramento fidelitatis et solut' v s' in
alba bursa

Dauid murray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paternitatis
prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Willelmus lepar' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paternitatis
prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Johannes atkynsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde solut' xxxti s'
preposito prestito solito Juramento

Dauid michelsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jur
prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s' preposito in alba bursa

Johannes lundoris filius et heres apparens Duncanj lundoris recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s' preposito in alba bursa

Johannes Roberti ad Instanciam Johannis Wormet et gracia prepositi recipitur in liberum
burgensem prestito solito Juramento et solut' xiij s' et iiij d'

Willelmus lamginton' Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde solut' v s' in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Johannes blak recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsavit filiam burgensem
prestito solito Juramento

thomas chamer tinctor gracia prepositi et consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento

thomas menyes gracia prepositi et consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento
Johannes grene gracia prepositi et consilij libere recipitur in burgen' prestito solito Juramento

Dauid lousone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Ranaldus Jamesone gracia prepositi et diuersorum consilij recipitur in liberum
burgensem prestito solito Juramento

Johannes lame pistor recipitur in liberum burgensem gracia prepositi et diuersorum consilij
prestito solito Juramento

Johannes Walcar gracia prepositi et diuersorum consilij recipitur in liberum
burgensem prestito solito Juramento

thomas Waus racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde solut' v s' in alba bursa et solut' v s' prestito solito Juramento

Johannes Waus racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
solito Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Patricius rede Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
solito Juramento et solut' v s'

Johannes de Camera Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde solut'
v s' in alba bursa et prestito Juramento solito
